data.prayer: Father, convict the 13,416 believers in Kalmar to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kalmar, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Kalmar to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 233,500 people living in the state of Kalmar.
Lord, there are 117,028 people in the state of Kalmar who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tibetan people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, bring yourself glory in Kalmar. Through your servants plant 46 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kalmar
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kalmar, Sweden the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

location.name: Kalmar
